Class Server

java.lang.Object
  Server

public class Server
extends java.lang.Object

Server class used to send the simulation request and gather payout results until reach convergence accuracy. Server class includes methods for sending message via queue (message producer), for receiving message via topic (result consumer).

Author:
yixia

Constructor Summary

          Constructs a new server by initializing an option type (European/Asian).

resultConsumer

public double resultConsumer()
                      throws javax.jms.JMSException

payout calculated by client and received from specific topic
